title: Continues Crashes
body: I accidentally shut down my pc (when I was putting my blind down, it knocked out my power cable. Weak cable). When I re-logged and tried to reconnect, the game wouldn't stop crashing, preventing me from joining my game (ranked). Any reason why? I know I have a PC more than capable running lol, and this has never happened to me before.

replies.body: Well, a lot of people have been experiencing connection issues of late. Is this still affecting you?
It's not internet connection issues, it's the game crashing (bugsplat). My internet's was fine the few games before

There's a possibility that some of your graphical drivers were updating when you knocked out the power. The general idea companies have nowadays is to automatically install updates with no user interaction. The benefit is that you don't have to lift a finger to remain updated and secure. Downside is that when you accidentally lose power, you could cause irreversible damage to your operating system (all automatic updates comes with the disclaimer saying that you should not turn off your computer while it is updating).

Not all hope is lost, though. Go and update your drivers and your OS, see if just installing the newest update will fix the problems caused.

Best of luck.
